title: section 69 of the Courts of Justice Act 1936, by virtue of the powers conferred on
heading: 1. (1) These Rules, which may be cited as the Circuit Court Rules (Case
text_raw:
1. (1) These Rules, which may be cited as the Circuit Court Rules (Case 

Stated) 2020, shall come into operation on the 13th day of August 2020. 

(2) These Rules shall be construed together with the Circuit Court Rules 2001 

to 2020. 

(3) The Circuit Court Rules 2001 to 2020 as amended by these Rules may be 

cited as the Circuit Court Rules 2001 to 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) rule may cited circuit court rule (case stated) 2020 shall come operation 13th day august 2020 (2) rule shall construed together circuit court rule 2001 2020 (3) circuit court rule 2001 2020 amended rule may cited circuit court rule 2001 2020

title: section 69 of the Courts of Justice Act 1936, by virtue of the powers conferred on
heading: 2. The Circuit Court Rules are amended by the substitution in Order 62 for
text_raw:
2. The Circuit Court Rules are amended by the substitution in Order 62 for 

rule 5 of the following rule: 

“5. As soon as the Case Stated shall have been signed it shall be lodged 
with the County Registrar for transmission to the Court of Appeal.” 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th August, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [292]
text_norm: 2 circuit court rule amended substitution order 62 rule 5 following rule 5 soon case stated shall signed shall lodged county registrar transmission court appeal notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 11th august 2020 4 292

title: section 69 of the Courts of Justice Act 1936, by virtue of the powers conferred on
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This rule rectifies Order 62 rule 5 by substituting “Court of Appeal” for 
“Supreme Court”.
